channel.title: :mad: I need help spawning items and NPCS! :mad:
channel.description: :eek: I'm mad because I can't find out how to spawn things.. can someone direct me to a guide of some sort?? :eek:

item.title: :mad: I need help spawning items and NPCS! :mad:
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

Do you want the NPC to be there permantly and do you want the item to spwan on the ground???

If so go into your NPCHander for that
or
If so go to the ITEMHander for that

-Wonderguy6 The creator of WonderWDFscape!

Hope it helped

Read full topic

item.title: :mad: I need help spawning items and NPCS! :mad:
item.dc:creator: @Huntchez Huntchez
item.description:
@Huntchez wrote:

Yes

its recommended that when spawning or changing monsters that you do not go over the last monster’s code such as

false ex*

lowest=1 man
Highest=4000 black knight

go over 4000 and the server crashes until the system can traces the previous settings.

some servers dont have spawn due to the fact that the admins disabled it.

Read full topic
